resources.string: This is not a functional SMS app.

• The Full access option essentially breaks all messaging functionality. All incoming messages will be lost while that feature is enabled.

• On Marshmallow and above (API levels 23+), the read-only option gives access to only sent and inbox messages.

• Apps can't revoke permissions, so reverting the read-only option must be done manually through Settings, which should open automatically upon selecting that option.

• On API levels 29+, the default SMS app must also be reverted manually, through the previous one, which should also open automatically.

• Disabling the full access option will oftentimes leave the read-only access enabled, even if you hadn't explicitly enabled it beforehand.

• The warning notification, if enabled, will not update until this app resumes, should a launched operation pause it.
